description: Occasionally XenServer based instances won't get their agent messages correctly and act on them on provisioning.  It appears there may be a race condition from the time where the instance starts and the agent injects configuration messages.  We may need to add a tunable timeout or retry to ensure the messages are ack'd.
title: xenserver agent calls getting lost
